name: Toynado
description:
Create wind by moving the mouse and rotate it to create a tornado. Fulfill tasks and explore the area. Created as a game jam project in our 4th semester in three weeks.

Credits

Maria Fleischer - Programming, System & Level Design, Animation

Felix Sczecsny - Programming, System & Level Design, Project Management

Meike Strippel - 3D Modeling, Texturing, Visual Development

Robin Zitt - Programming, Sound Design, System Design
